General.Name: Shandong Yuma Sun-shading Technology Corp. Ltd.
General.Description: Shandong Yuma Sun-shading Technology Corp., Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of functional shading materials in China. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Shouguang, China.
General.Address: No. 1966, Jinguang West Street, Shouguang, China, 262700
